properties.name: calculateFilterExpression
properties.description: Specifies a function that returns a filter expression for this custom operation.

properties.name: customizeText
properties.description: Customizes the field value's text representation.

properties.name: dataTypes
properties.description: Specifies for which data types the operation is available by default.

properties.name: editorComponent
properties.description: An alias for the [editorTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: editorRender
properties.description: An alias for the [editorTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: editorTemplate
properties.description: Specifies a custom template for the UI component used to edit the field value.

properties.name: hasValue
properties.description: Specifies whether the operation can have a value. If it can, the editor is displayed.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Specifies the icon that should represent the filter operation.
